response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11000}
